name: Elementos
description: Elementos is a web-based application that allows you to explore periodic table elements.

name: CSS Reductor
description: CSS Redcutor is a simple framework sort of like Bootstrap to handle element positioning using css classes. This project does not intend to replace Bootstrap or any major css framework (yet).

name: RTomlCop
description: RTomlCop is a linter tool built in ruby for toml files. This tool will inspect a toml file and search for errors to display them.

name: XPens
description: Xpens is a web application that allows you to save all your expenses and categorize them into folders.
